title: HP DeskJet 2822e All-in-One Printer
description: HP DeskJet 2822e All-in-One Printer — compact and efficient printer with wireless connectivity, 5.5 pages per minute printing speed, and support for mobile printing. Ideal for home and small office use, offering printing, scanning, and copying in one device.

title: HP DeskJet 2822e All-in-One Printer
description: Compact and efficient wireless printer offering print, copy, and scan functions. Ideal for home and small office use, featuring HP+ smart ink delivery and reliable Wi-Fi connectivity.

specs.Cartridges: HP 305 Setup Black (~120 pages), HP 305 Setup Tri-Color (~100 pages)

title: HP LaserJet M207dw Wireless Monochrome Laser Printer
description: Compact and efficient wireless monochrome laser printer, ideal for home offices. Features fast printing up to 28 pages per minute, automatic duplex printing, and dual-band Wi-Fi connectivity.

title: HP LaserJet M207dw Wireless Monochrome Laser Printer
description: Compact and efficient wireless monochrome laser printer, ideal for home offices. Features fast printing up to 28 pages per minute, automatic duplex printing, and dual-band Wi-Fi connectivity.

title: HP OfficeJet Pro 9120e All-in-One Printer
description: The HP OfficeJet Pro 9120e is a versatile all-in-one printer designed for small to medium-sized businesses. It offers printing, scanning, copying, and faxing capabilities, with high-quality output, mobile printing support, and HP+ features for smart ink management.

specs.Print Quality: Up to 1200 x 1200 rendered dpi (B/W), 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi (Color)
specs.Mobile Printing: Apple AirPrint, Mopria, HP Smart App

title: PANTUM BM2309W 3-in-1 Multifunction Laser Printer
description: The PANTUM BM2309W is a compact monochrome laser printer designed for home offices and small businesses. It offers printing, scanning, and copying capabilities with wireless connectivity, including support for AirPrint, Mopria, and the Pantum app.

title: Epson EcoTank ET-2850 All-in-One Printer
description: The Epson EcoTank ET-2850 is a cost-efficient all-in-one inkjet printer designed for home offices and small businesses. It offers printing, scanning, and copying capabilities with wireless connectivity and a cartridge-free EcoTank ink system.

specs.Mobile Printing: Apple AirPrint, Mopria, Epson Smart Panel

title: HP OfficeJet 250 Mobile All-in-One Printer
description: The HP OfficeJet 250 is a compact and portable all-in-one printer designed for mobile professionals. It offers printing, scanning, and copying capabilities with wireless connectivity and a built-in battery for on-the-go use.

specs.Print Resolution: Up to 1200 x 1200 rendered dpi (black), 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi (color)

title: Canon PIXMA TR4750i Multifunction Printer
description: The Canon PIXMA TR4750i is a versatile 4-in-1 inkjet printer designed for home offices. It offers printing, scanning, copying, and faxing capabilities with wireless connectivity and automatic double-sided printing.

specs.Mobile Printing: Apple AirPrint, Mopria, Canon PRINT app

title: AMD Ryzen 7 5700G 8-Core, 16-Thread Processor with Radeon Graphics
description: The AMD Ryzen 7 5700G is a high-performance APU featuring 8 cores and 16 threads, integrated Radeon Vega 8 graphics, and a base clock of 3.8 GHz, suitable for gaming and productivity tasks without a dedicated GPU.

title: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D 8-Core, 16-Thread Processor
description: The AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D is a high-performance desktop processor featuring 3D V-Cache™ technology, offering exceptional gaming performance and multitasking capabilities.

title: Intel Core i3-12100F 12th Gen 4-Core, 8-Thread Processor
description: The Intel Core i3-12100F is a budget-friendly desktop processor from Intel's 12th generation Alder Lake series, offering 4 cores and 8 threads for efficient multitasking and gaming performance.
